full_summary:
Electrical Contractor Standing Offer
=====================================

**Tender Information**
---------------------

* **Reference Number**: WS3792217828-Doc3793851374
* **Amendment Number**: Amendment 3
* **Publication Date**: December 20, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: January 18, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

**Service and Contract Details**
------------------------------

This Standing Offer is for Electrical Contractor Services, aimed at undertaking general electrical work, including installation, maintenance, expansion, alteration, decommissioning, and repairs of electrical, lighting, control, communication, security, fire alarm, and electrical distribution systems.

The Standing Offer will be executed at the following Correctional Service of Canada institutions:

* Grierson Centre, Edmonton, AB
* Edmonton Institution for Women, Edmonton, AB
* Edmonton Maximum Security Institution, Edmonton, AB

The successful contractor is expected to provide services on an as-needed basis, effective March 1, 2023, and concluding on March 1, 2026.

**Invitation to Bid**
---------------------

Canada invites eligible contractors to submit bids. The selection criteria will be based on the lowest price.

**Trade Agreements and Regions**
------------------------------

This opportunity has been advertised under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and is open to bidders from Canada.

**Contact Information**
---------------------

To obtain more information or clarification, please contact:

* Eric Kwan (SPAC)
* Telephone: NA
* Email: [eric.kwan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:eric.kwan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Online Bid Submission**
-------------------------

Bids must be submitted online through [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14940903?extsite=MTQ5NDA5MDNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14940903?extsite=MTQ5NDA5MDNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

**Note**: Kindly disregard the initial Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All bidders are required to submit their bids by January 18, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST.  The late submission of bids will be considered non-responsive.
